name: repost
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put one of your previous posts (= messages, pictures, etc.) on a website or on social media again: I thought I would repost the ground rules. I'll have to search my files and see if I can find it and repost it.
to put something on a website or on social media that someone else previously posted: Would you mind if I repost this on Facebook? If you repost any material from this blog, please give credit by including a link back to me.
More examplesFewer examplesI truly believe that you should repost a lot of what you wrote way back.I will repost in the next week to update on my success.Please do not repost our stuff elsewhere.If over 100,000 people repost it, he will renew the contract.I'd repost but do not have access to the screenshots from here.

something such as a message or picture that you put on a website or on social media again: This is a repost of one of my earlier comments but it's relevant. I posted this question about a year ago, and am trying a repost in the hope that someone can help.
a message, picture, etc. originally posted by someone else that you put on a website or on social media : The system will calculate popularity by a Tweet's number of reposts and the general influence of the user who posted it. Any party who intends to use photographs or contents for a repost, please request prior permission.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is a repost of the post I lost when Blogger went down the other day.These thoughts are just simply reposts from a thread I initiated in this forum.This is one of the most interesting reposts I've ever read on the boards.
